description.value: The RESPNet Report Context codesystem contains a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying specific respnet programs that can use the reported data.

definition.value: Report that indicates this is a RESPNet case report

display.value: RESPNet report for a Hospital-based influenza case

definition.value: RESPNet report is generated based on a positive flu test result and the corresponding encounter is still in-progress (encounter.status = in-progress)

display.value: RESPNet report for Hospital-based clinical influenza surveillance

definition.value: RESPNet report is generated based on a positive flu test result and the corresponding encounter is closed (encounter.status=discharged|completed)

display.value: RESPNet report for Hospital-based disease burden case

definition.value: RESPNet report is generated based on an Acute Respiratory Illness diagnosis and the administration of a test for one of Flu or Covid or RSV and the corresponding encounter is closed (encounter.status=discharged|completed)
RESPNet report is generated based on a positive covid-19 test result and the corresponding encounter is closed (encounter.status=discharged|completed)
RESPNet report is generated based on a positive rsv test result and the corresponding encounter is closed (encounter.status=discharged|completed)

display.value: RESPNet report for influenza effectiveness evaluation

definition.value: RESPNet report is generated based on a negative flu test result and the corresponding encounter is closed (encounter.status=discharged|completed)
